title: Dev-Services throw an exception on live reload if `quarkus.datasource.devservices.image-name` is set

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

1. https://code.quarkus.io/?e=resteasy-reactive-jackson&e=agroal&e=jdbc-postgresql&e=flyway&e=kotlin
2. Add the following `application.properties` file:

```
quarkus.datasource.db-kind=postgresql
quarkus.datasource.devservices.image-name=postgres:13.2

quarkus.flyway.schemas=xyz
quarkus.flyway.migrate-at-start=true
```
3. Every code change leads to an exception.
